revised_title: The Mobility of Positive Ions in Helium: Part I - Helium Ions
tldr: The authors conducted experiments on the mobility of positive ions in helium gas, focusing on the impact of impurities on ion mobility. They discovered that even small traces of impurities significantly affect the speed at which charge is carried through the gas. The authors developed new techniques to reduce the effect of impurities and improve the accuracy of their measurements.
